Sam: The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Sam asks how you feel. How should we answer?
Sam suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
Sam is saying that his teammates are what keeps him going.
Sam has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. He is asking for your evaluation on his plays. Let's give him an answer.
As Sam said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to him.
The crowd is cheering for Sam. Sam seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help him out.
Sam is impressed by the help he received from the elementals. Let's talk to him.
Sam was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin himself. Let's talk to him.
The team will not have a match for some time. Sam asks you about your plan.
It's a very intense match and Sam falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Sam up and the two exchange smiles.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Sam having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
Sam is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to him.
Sam scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate him!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Sam.
Sam falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to him?
Sam lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Sam. Let's talk to her.
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Sam is curious and wants to take a look.
Sam brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
You find Sam depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer him up.
Sam is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
You come across Sam being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to him.
Sam is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give him an answer.
Sam is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to him.
Sam is stressed out saying his opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
Sam seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to him.
You come across Sam who is limping. He says it's nothing. What should we do?
You visit Merlin's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
You're watching the storm with Sam and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
Sam looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
Sam's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Sam seems to be nervous. Let's talk to him.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Sam.
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.

The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Sam do?

Sam is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?

Helen
Helen is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
Helen is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
Helen wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
Helen is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
Helen is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
Helen is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
Helen says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
Helen seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
Ogre's pony tail slapped Helen in the face!
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
Helen is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
Helen says that the Swirlies are missing.
Helen says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?

Helen picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
Helen is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
Helen thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
Helen seems to be lost after having a good match while her fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to her.
With a serious face, Helen is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give her an answer.

Helen is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give her an answer.
The team is having a good run and Helen is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
Helen seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
Helen seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
Helen is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
Helen is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
Helen plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Helen and talk about what to do.
Helen seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.

Victoria falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
Victoria lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Victoria. Let's talk to her.
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Victoria is curious and wants to take a look.
Victoria brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
Victoria is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give her an answer.
Victoria, who is determined to make everything in her life, even her dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
Victoria announces that she will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give her an answer.
Victoria is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to her?
Victoria wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. She wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to her.
It seems that Victoria is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
You find Victoria lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
Victoria says she doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. She thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
Victoria wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
Victoria caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Victoria some orders.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Victoria seems to be worried.
Victoria came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
Victoria is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer her up?
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Victoria seems to be sick of this.
Victoria looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Victoria to set some simple rules.
Lucian
Lucian says he's the center of the team and asks if you agree with him. How should we answer?
Lucian asks you about your plans after winning the Galaxy League. Let's give him a sincere answer.
Lucian is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.
Lucian looks excited to see a comet shower, which is a rare sight. What should we say to him?
Lucian says he's having trouble dealing with the young players. Let's give him an answer.
Lucian wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give him an answer.
Lucian is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to him.
Lucian says he was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.
Lucian says that Bell seemed depressed when he told Bell that Minerva's throne is empty.
Lucian seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell him?
Lucian is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
Lucian says he's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.
Kei and Virgil are fighting again and Lucian seems to be troubled. What should we do?
Lucian is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle.
Lucian went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?
Lucian claims he saw Sophie of team Atlanta coming out of the men's room. What could be the case?
Lucian seems very nervous to confront Kei of the Rescuer.
Lucian says that the captain of team Scout Entry seems to take good care of the team members.
You enter the lodging feeling lonely on your birthday. The team greets you with a surprise and Lucian hands you a present.
Lucian says that he thinks Alkyde looks at Fontus in a funny way. Let's give him an answer.

Let's talk to Lucian who recently started to take interest in the world of angels.

Roina
Roina is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
After a meeting, Roina's eyes met yours a several times and Roina asks if she has something on her face.
With a serious look on her face, Roina warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.

Kevin
Kevin is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give him an answer.
Kevin, who is determined to make everything in his life, even his dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
Kevin announces that he will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give him an answer.
Kevin is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to him?
Kevin wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. He wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to him.
It seems that Kevin is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
You find Kevin lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
Kevin says he doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. He thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
Kevin wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
Kevin caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Kevin some orders.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Kevin seems to be worried.
Kevin came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
Kevin is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer him up?
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Kevin seems to be sick of this.
Kevin looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.

Kevin wants to have an academic conversation about the 5th dimension, string theory, and other infamously hard space theories. Why...?

Kevin seems to be uncomfortable to hear about the love life of other teammates. Let's talk to him.

Kevin is furious about how Lucian is always surrounded by girls. What should we say?

Kevin is spreading the happy news about his cousin having a baby. Let's congratulate him.

Latios is chatting with Lucius after the match. Let's barge in.

Xiao Long
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Xiao Long asks how you feel. How should we answer?
Xiao Long suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
Xiao Long is saying that his teammates are what keeps him going.
Xiao Long has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. He is asking for your evaluation on his plays. Let's give him an answer.
As Xiao Long said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to him.
The crowd is cheering for Xiao Long. Xiao Long seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help him out.
Xiao Long is impressed by the help he received from the elementals. Let's talk to him.
Xiao Long was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin himself. Let's talk to him.
The team will not have a match for some time. Xiao Long asks you about your plan.
It's a very intense match and Xiao Long falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Xiao Long up and the two exchange smiles.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Xiao Long having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
Xiao Long is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to him.

Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Xiao Long is curious and wants to take a look.

Xiao Long is worried about all of the powerful beings that will be competing in the Galaxy League. Let's say something to him.
Xiao Long is training hard to become scouted like the players that moved to teams that offered better conditions. Let's give him some advice.
Xiao Long isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. He feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Xiao Long for solutions.
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Xiao Long and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest.
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
According to Xiao Long's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
Xiao Long thinks he knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
Xiao Long won a trip around the world from a radio event!
Xiao Long suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.

X000 Eden is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.

The team is having a good run and X000 Eden is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
X000 Eden seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
X000 Eden seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
X000 Eden is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.

X000 Eden plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.

AE65 Black Mash
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. AE65 Black Mash asks how you feel. How should we answer?
AE65 Black Mash suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
AE65 Black Mash is saying that his teammates are what keeps him going.
AE65 Black Mash has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. He is asking for your evaluation on his plays. Let's give him an answer.
As AE65 Black Mash said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to him.
The crowd is cheering for AE65 Black Mash. AE65 Black Mash seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help him out.
AE65 Black Mash is impressed by the help he received from the elementals. Let's talk to him.
AE65 Black Mash was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin himself. Let's talk to him.
The team will not have a match for some time. AE65 Black Mash asks you about your plan.
It's a very intense match and AE65 Black Mash falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps AE65 Black Mash up and the two exchange smiles.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across AE65 Black Mash having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
AE65 Black Mash is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to him.
AE65 Black Mash scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate him!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with AE65 Black Mash.
AE65 Black Mash falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to him?
AE65 Black Mash lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?

It seems that AE65 Black Mash is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?

Blade is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give her an answer.
Blade, who is determined to make everything in her life, even her dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
Blade announces that she will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give her an answer.
Blade is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to her?
Blade wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. She wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to her.
It seems that Blade is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
You find Blade lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?

You come across Griffith who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
You're watching the storm with Griffith and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
Griffith looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
Griffith's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Griffith seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Griffith.
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Griffith and her opponent isn't over yet.
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Griffith do?
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?

Griffith is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
Latios is chatting with Griffith after the match. Let's barge in.
Cynthia
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Cynthia asks how you feel. How should we answer?
Cynthia suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
Cynthia is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
Cynthia has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
As Cynthia said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
The crowd is cheering for Cynthia. Cynthia seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
Cynthia is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
Cynthia was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
The team will not have a match for some time. Cynthia asks you about your plan.
It's a very intense match and Cynthia falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Cynthia up and the two exchange smiles.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Cynthia having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
Cynthia is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
Cynthia scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Cynthia.
Cynthia falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
Cynthia lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Cynthia. Let's talk to her.
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Cynthia is curious and wants to take a look.
Cynthia brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
Cynthia is asking you what you think is it that makes this team great. You weren't expecting this, but you should give her an answer.
Cynthia is angry because she was criticized by her performance and is asking your opinion. Let's give her an answer.
Cynthia, who has shown absolutely superb chemistry with you, is embarrassed and says she didn't do all of that because of you. What should we say?
Cynthia wants to have an academic conversation about the 5th dimension, string theory, and other infamously hard space theories. Why...?
Cynthia looks disappointed about the size of the Galaxy League. What would be an appropriate response?
Cynthia seems to be uncomfortable to hear about the love life of other teammates. Let's talk to her.
Cynthia is talking about how famous her rivals are in the Galaxy League. She seems jealous. Let's talk to her.
Cynthia is furious about how Lucian is always surrounded by girls. What should we say?
Kirin suddenly appears, pats Cynthia on the head while teasing her, and then goes away. Cynthia seems angry...
The team is at Metro City. Cynthia seems to be surprised how the people of Metro City have mechanical bodies.
Kuma is furiously chasing Ogre. Cynthia seems confused.
Cynthia is spreading the happy news about her cousin having a baby. Let's congratulate her.
The team seems very nervous facing Skalardra. What should we do?
Cynthia refuses to listen to anybody's advice saying he's the best and he doesn't need any advice. Let's talk to her.
Cynthia is interested in Selena and is asking for your opinion. What should we say?

Cynthia seems to be determined to crush the opposing team. Let's give her some advice.

Bell
Bell is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
After a meeting, Bell's eyes met yours a several times and Bell asks if she has something on her face.
With a serious look on her face, Bell warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.
Preparing for the press conference, you're talking with Bell on which player you think has the brightest future. What will you say?
Bell is worried that she has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell her?
Bell is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to her.
Bell is asking if you have a special person who you would like to share happy moments with. Let's give her an answer.
You find Bell being very excited after performing an awesome play. How will you react?
Bell is having trouble focusing on the match. Let's help her out.
Bell is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.
Bell doesn't like the new team advertisement video.

You see Bell's opponent trash talking and smirking towards Bell. What should we do?

Bell comes to you and says that she has to leave the team because of personal reasons. What should we say?
Bell is getting slow on the field and this is causing trouble. Let's talk with Bell.
Bell is telling a story about how an old kingdom in Valhalla was doomed because of the king.
You got a couple of tickets to Veronica's live concert. Bell seems to be interested.

This was the worst game in your entire life...Bell comes to you to cheer you up.

Bell isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. She feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Bell for solutions.
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Bell and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest.
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
According to Bell's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
Bell thinks she knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
Bell won a trip around the world from a radio event!
Bell suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.

Bell wonders why Castor twitches whenever he sees Beatrice.

Freyja is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to her?
Freyja wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. She wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to her.
It seems that Freyja is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
You find Freyja lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
Freyja says she doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. She thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
Freyja wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
Freyja caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Freyja some orders.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Freyja seems to be worried.
Freyja came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
Freyja is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer her up?
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Freyja seems to be sick of this.
Freyja looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Freyja to set some simple rules.
Freyja is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
After a meeting, Freyja's eyes met yours a several times and Freyja asks if she has something on her face.
With a serious look on her face, Freyja warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.
Preparing for the press conference, you're talking with Freyja on which player you think has the brightest future. What will you say?
Freyja is worried that she has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell her?
Freyja is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to her.
Freyja is asking if you have a special person who you would like to share happy moments with. Let's give her an answer.
You find Freyja being very excited after performing an awesome play. How will you react?
Freyja is having trouble focusing on the match. Let's help her out.
Freyja is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.
Freyja doesn't like the new team advertisement video.
It's Freyja's birthday. Let's give her a present.
You see Freyja's opponent trash talking and smirking towards Freyja. What should we do?
The team is going to go shop. Which group will you join?

Freyja comes to you and says that she has to leave the team because of personal reasons. What should we say?
Freyja is getting slow on the field and this is causing trouble. Let's talk with Freyja.
Freyja is telling a story about how an old kingdom in Valhalla was doomed because of the king.
You got a couple of tickets to Veronica's live concert. Freyja seems to be interested.
Freyja says she wants to cry because the goal keeper on the other team just won't go down no matter how many shots she makes.

Freyja suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
Freyja is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.

As Freyja said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.

James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
Sorrow is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer her up?
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Sorrow seems to be sick of this.
Sorrow looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.

Sorrow is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
Sorrow is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
Sorrow wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
Sorrow is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
Sorrow is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
Sorrow is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
Sorrow says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
Sorrow seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
Ogre's pony tail slapped Sorrow in the face!
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?

Sorrow says that the Swirlies are missing.
Sorrow says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
Sorrow picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
Sorrow is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
Sorrow thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
Sorrow is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give her an answer.
Sorrow, who is determined to make everything in her life, even her dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
Sorrow announces that she will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give her an answer.
Sorrow is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to her?
Sorrow wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. She wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to her.
It seems that Sorrow is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
You find Sorrow lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?

Momo
Momo is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
After a meeting, Momo's eyes met yours a several times and Momo asks if she has something on her face.
With a serious look on her face, Momo warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.

Momo is worried that she has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell her?
Momo is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to her.

Momo is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.

You're watching the storm with Momo and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
Momo looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
Momo's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Momo seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.

Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give him some advice.

Wukong refuses to listen to anybody's advice saying he's the best and he doesn't need any advice. Let's talk to him.
Wukong is interested in Selena and is asking for your opinion. What should we say?
Wukong seems to be interested in the Micrinum from Kiri, which is said to be good for beauty and anti-aging. Let's talk to him.
Wukong seems to be determined to crush the opposing team. Let's give him some advice.
Wukong looks sad because he feels his friendship with a friend in a rival team is falling apart. What should we say to him?
It's a tough match, but Wukong is standing tall and encouraging the team. What should we say to him?
A teammate that is a former member of the Dark Sisters is down sick, suffering from the aftermath of performing exorcism. Let's talk with Wukong about what to do.
Sena
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Sena asks how you feel. How should we answer?
Sena suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
Sena is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
Sena has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
As Sena said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
The crowd is cheering for Sena. Sena seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
Sena is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
Sena was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
The team will not have a match for some time. Sena asks you about your plan.
It's a very intense match and Sena falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Sena up and the two exchange smiles.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Sena having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
Sena is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
Sena scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Sena.
Sena falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
Sena lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Sena. Let's talk to her.
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Sena is curious and wants to take a look.
Sena brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
Sena is looking excited and asks how the match went.
This was the worst game in your entire life...Sena comes to you to cheer you up.
You're talking to Sena about what you would do if the world ends tomorrow. Let's tell her your answer.
Sena is worried about all of the powerful beings that will be competing in the Galaxy League. Let's say something to her.
Sena is training hard to become scouted like the players that moved to teams that offered better conditions. Let's give her some advice.
Sena isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. She feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Sena for solutions.
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Sena and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest.
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.

Sena thinks she knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
Sena won a trip around the world from a radio event!
Sena suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.

Linmay

After a meeting, Linmay's eyes met yours a several times and Linmay asks if she has something on her face.
With a serious look on her face, Linmay warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.

Linmay is worried that she has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell her?
Linmay is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to her.

Linmay is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.

Karuru
Karuru is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
Karuru is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
Karuru wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
Karuru is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
Karuru is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
Karuru is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
Karuru says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
Karuru seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
Ogre's pony tail slapped Karuru in the face!
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
Karuru is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
Karuru says that the Swirlies are missing.
Karuru says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
Karuru picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
Karuru is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
Karuru thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.
Karuru is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give her an answer.
Karuru, who is determined to make everything in her life, even her dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
Karuru announces that she will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give her an answer.
Karuru is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to her?
Karuru wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. She wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to her.
It seems that Karuru is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
You find Karuru lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
Karuru says she doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. She thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
Karuru wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
Karuru caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Karuru some orders.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.

Miho
Miho is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give her an answer.
Miho, who is determined to make everything in her life, even her dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
Miho announces that she will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give her an answer.
Miho is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to her?
Miho wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. She wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to her.
It seems that Miho is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
You find Miho lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?

The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Miho some orders.

Miho came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.

Miho is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer her up?

It's a very intense match and Magnus falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Magnus up and the two exchange smiles.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Magnus having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
Magnus is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to him.
Magnus scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate him!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Magnus.
Magnus falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to him?
Magnus lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Magnus. Let's talk to her.
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Magnus is curious and wants to take a look.
Magnus brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
You come across Magnus, who was overwhelmed by his opponent throughout the game. Let's cheer him up.
Magnus is complaining about a teammate and is asking for your opinion.
Magnus, who is always suspicious of you, has you in the corner and is demanding that you reveal what your agenda really is. What should we say?
Magnus says to you that it was an honor to be able to play with you. Let's give him an answer.
You're having a conversation with Magnus about the power of Spirit Stones which is covered in secrets. Let's tell him what you think.
Magnus is yelling, ''Our will for soccer is guiding us to victory!''
Let's talk to Magnus who recently started to take interest in the world of angels.
Magnus is asking you if you ever saw the World Tree. Let's tell him your thoughts.
The teammates are speaking highly of Magnus, saying he's a good role model. Let's add in.
You visit the practice field of your next opponent and feel very sorry about their not-so-good financial situation. What should we do?
Your team seems to be too worried about the next match against the all stars of Minerva. Magnus wants to say a word.
You're at the Underground to enter a wager match, but you find people who are playing a friendly match.
Half of your team is injured because of an evil plot of your next opponent. What should we do?

The representative of the refugees of Karladure is pleading you to throw the next match because Guinevere, who is providing them economic support, is playing for your next opponent. What should we say?
Magnus points out that the time the men of Minerva died and the time the epidemic broke out in Metro City matches.
Mortor and Wizol of the Peacemakers are helping an old man. Magnus seems to be surprised.
A big fight broke out between an angel and a demon within the team. Magnus is asking for help.
Cracsus threatens to hack Magnus's personal information and reveal it to the world. What should we do?
Magnus is thinking about what Selena said about saving the galaxy if we win the Galaxy League.
Magnus is thinking about what the Universe of Oblivion is.
Magnus
Magnus is asking you what you think is it that makes this team great. You weren't expecting this, but you should give him an answer.
Magnus is angry because he was criticized by his performance and is asking your opinion. Let's give him an answer.
Magnus, who has shown absolutely superb chemistry with you, is embarrassed and says he didn't do all of that because of you. What should we say?
Magnus wants to have an academic conversation about the 5th dimension, string theory, and other infamously hard space theories. Why...?
Magnus looks disappointed about the size of the Galaxy League. What would be an appropriate response?
Magnus seems to be uncomfortable to hear about the love life of other teammates. Let's talk to him.
Magnus is talking about how famous his rivals are in the Galaxy League. He seems jealous. Let's talk to him.
Magnus is furious about how Lucian is always surrounded by girls. What should we say?
Kirin suddenly appears, pats Magnus on the head while teasing him, and then goes away. Magnus seems angry...
The team is at Metro City. Magnus seems to be surprised how the people of Metro City have mechanical bodies.
Kuma is furiously chasing Ogre. Magnus seems confused.
Magnus is spreading the happy news about his cousin having a baby. Let's congratulate him.
The team seems very nervous facing Skalardra. What should we do?
Magnus refuses to listen to anybody's advice saying he's the best and he doesn't need any advice. Let's talk to him.
Magnus is interested in Selena and is asking for your opinion. What should we say?

Magnus seems to be determined to crush the opposing team. Let's give him some advice.

Elizabeth
Elizabeth is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
Elizabeth is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
Elizabeth wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
Elizabeth is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
Elizabeth is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
Elizabeth is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
Elizabeth says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
Elizabeth seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
Ogre's pony tail slapped Elizabeth in the face!
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
Elizabeth is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
Elizabeth says that the Swirlies are missing.
Elizabeth says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
Elizabeth picked up a diary. It says Bell on the cover.
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
Elizabeth is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
Elizabeth thinks Nana on the other team actually isn't a raccoon.

Elizabeth is getting suspicious about how all the Gate Keepers are in the form of different animals.

Elizabeth wants to know what the Swirlies really are. Give her an answer.
Elizabeth is saying that the universe needs more than stars to brighten it up. Let's talk to her.
Elizabeth says she was cornered by the team which was devastated by the loss streak.

Elizabeth seems to get along with the opponent player. What should we tell her?
Elizabeth is deeply focused on Jill's diet story. What should we do?
Elizabeth says she's going to meet up with Kiki and asks if you have any questions.

Elizabeth is having a delightful chat with a girl that's holding a turtle.
Elizabeth went to take a look at the opponent team and got caught. What should we do?

Elizabeth seems very nervous to confront Kei of the Rescuer.

Kaidormu
Kaidormu is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give him an answer.
Kaidormu, who is determined to make everything in his life, even his dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
Kaidormu announces that he will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give him an answer.
Kaidormu is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to him?
Kaidormu wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. He wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to him.
It seems that Kaidormu is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
You find Kaidormu lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
Kaidormu says he doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. He thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
Kaidormu wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
Kaidormu caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Kaidormu some orders.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Kaidormu seems to be worried.
Kaidormu came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
Kaidormu is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer him up?
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Kaidormu seems to be sick of this.
Kaidormu looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Kaidormu to set some simple rules.
Kaidormu seems to be lost after having a good match while his fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to him.
With a serious face, Kaidormu is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give him an answer.
Kaidormu came to you after the match, and says he's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
Kaidormu is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give him an answer.
The team is having a good run and Kaidormu is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
Kaidormu seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
Kaidormu seems to be upset about losing a body check against his opponent.
Kaidormu is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with him.

Kaidormu plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with him.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Kaidormu and talk about what to do.
Kaidormu seems to be lost. He says he no longer hates the rival team.

Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Jess seems to be worried.
Jess came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
Jess is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer him up?
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Jess seems to be sick of this.
Jess looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Jess to set some simple rules.

Evylin is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
After a meeting, Evylin's eyes met yours a several times and Evylin asks if she has something on her face.
With a serious look on her face, Evylin warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.
Preparing for the press conference, you're talking with Evylin on which player you think has the brightest future. What will you say?
Evylin is worried that she has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell her?
Evylin is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to her.

Aslan
You come across Aslan, who was overwhelmed by her opponent throughout the game. Let's cheer her up.
Aslan is complaining about a teammate and is asking for your opinion.
Aslan, who is always suspicious of you, has you in the corner and is demanding that you reveal who you really are. What should we answer?

You're having a conversation with Aslan about the power of Spirit Stones which is covered in secrets. Let's tell her what you think.
Aslan is yelling, ''Our will for soccer is guiding us to victory!''
Let's talk to Aslan who recently started to take interest in the world of angels.
Aslan is asking you if you ever saw the World Tree. Let's tell her your thoughts.

Cracsus threatens to hack Cassiel's personal information and reveal it to the world. What should we do?
Cassiel is thinking about what Selena said about saving the galaxy if we win the Galaxy League.
Cassiel is thinking about what the Universe of Oblivion is.
Cassiel is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell him?
Cassiel is asking about my ideal type of person. Should be careful about answering this...
Cassiel seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. He seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
Cassiel is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop him from causing any problems.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give him some advice.
Cassiel is having trouble deciding a name for his special move. His options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
Cassiel is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to him.
Cassiel is making a scene. He'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
Cassiel is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
Cassiel is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to him?
It's before the 2nd half, and Cassiel is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
You forgot to lock Cassiel and almost used him as training material! He looks very upset!
Cassiel is confused that he won the MVP. What should you tell him?
Cassiel is talking with the team about what they would be doing if they didn't start soccer. Let's join them.
The team is saying bad things about Cassiel for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
Cassiel is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
Cassiel seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to him.
On a day off, Cassiel is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
Cassiel is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?

Cassiel is complaining about a teammate and is asking for your opinion.
Cassiel, who is always suspicious of you, has you in the corner and is demanding that you reveal what your agenda really is. What should we say?

You're having a conversation with Cassiel about the power of Spirit Stones which is covered in secrets. Let's tell him what you think.
Cassiel is yelling, ''Our will for soccer is guiding us to victory!''
Let's talk to Cassiel who recently started to take interest in the world of angels.
Cassiel is asking you if you ever saw the World Tree. Let's tell him your thoughts.
The teammates are speaking highly of Cassiel, saying he's a good role model. Let's add in.
You visit the practice field of your next opponent and feel very sorry about their not-so-good financial situation. What should we do?
Your team seems to be too worried about the next match against the all stars of Minerva. Cassiel wants to say a word.

Half of your team is injured because of an evil plot of your next opponent. What should we do?

Lulu
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Lulu asks how you feel. How should we answer?
Lulu suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
Lulu is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
Lulu has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
As Lulu said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
The crowd is cheering for Lulu. Lulu seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
Lulu is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
Lulu was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
The team will not have a match for some time. Lulu asks you about your plan.
It's a very intense match and Lulu falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Lulu up and the two exchange smiles.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Lulu having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
Lulu is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.

Lulu is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
Lulu is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.

The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.

As Elua said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
The crowd is cheering for Elua. Elua seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
Elua is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
Elua was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
The team will not have a match for some time. Elua asks you about your plan.
It's a very intense match and Elua falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Elua up and the two exchange smiles.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Elua having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
Elua is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
Elua scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Elua.
Elua falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
Elua lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Elua. Let's talk to her.
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Elua is curious and wants to take a look.
Elua brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
You find Elua depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer her up.
Elua is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
You come across Elua being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to her.
Elua is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
Elua is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
Elua is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
Elua seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
You come across Elua who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
You're watching the storm with Elua and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
Elua looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
Elua's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Elua seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Elua.
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Elua and her opponent isn't over yet.
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Elua do?
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?

Dynames
Dynames is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give him an answer.
Dynames, who is determined to make everything in his life, even his dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
Dynames announces that he will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give him an answer.
Dynames is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to him?
Dynames wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. He wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to him.
It seems that Dynames is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
You find Dynames lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
Dynames says he doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. He thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
Dynames wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
Dynames caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Dynames some orders.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Dynames seems to be worried.
Dynames came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
Dynames is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer him up?
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Dynames seems to be sick of this.
Dynames looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Dynames to set some simple rules.
Dynames is asking you what you think is it that makes this team great. You weren't expecting this, but you should give him an answer.
Dynames is angry because he was criticized by his performance and is asking your opinion. Let's give him an answer.
Dynames, who has shown absolutely superb chemistry with you, is embarrassed and says he didn't do all of that because of you. What should we say?
Dynames wants to have an academic conversation about the 5th dimension, string theory, and other infamously hard space theories. Why...?
Dynames looks disappointed about the size of the Galaxy League. What would be an appropriate response?
Dynames seems to be uncomfortable to hear about the love life of other teammates. Let's talk to him.
Dynames is talking about how famous his rivals are in the Galaxy League. He seems jealous. Let's talk to him.
Dynames is furious about how Lucian is always surrounded by girls. What should we say?
Kirin suddenly appears, pats Dynames on the head while teasing him, and then goes away. Dynames seems angry...
The team is at Metro City. Dynames seems to be surprised how the people of Metro City have mechanical bodies.
Kuma is furiously chasing Ogre. Dynames seems confused.
Dynames is spreading the happy news about his cousin having a baby. Let's congratulate him.
The team seems very nervous facing Skalardra. What should we do?
Dynames refuses to listen to anybody's advice saying he's the best and he doesn't need any advice. Let's talk to him.
Dynames is interested in Selena and is asking for your opinion. What should we say?
Dynames seems to be interested in the Micrinum from Kiri, which is said to be good for beauty and anti-aging. Let's talk to him.
Dynames seems to be determined to crush the opposing team. Let's give him some advice.
Dynames looks sad because he feels his friendship with a friend in a rival team is falling apart. What should we say to him?
It's a tough match, but Dynames is standing tall and encouraging the team. What should we say to him?

Duke
Duke is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell him?
Duke is asking about my ideal type of person. Should be careful about answering this...
Duke seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. He seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
Duke is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop him from causing any problems.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give him some advice.
Duke is having trouble deciding a name for his special move. His options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
Duke is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to him.
Duke is making a scene. He'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
Duke is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
Duke is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to him?
It's before the 2nd half, and Duke is complaining that we're up against an opponent that's too strong.
You forgot to lock Duke and almost used him as training material! He looks very upset!
Duke is confused that he won the MVP. What should you tell him?
Duke is talking with the team about what they would be doing if they didn't start soccer. Let's join them.
The team is saying bad things about Duke for skipping practice. Time to intervene.
Duke is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
Duke seems to be worried about one of the team members that left after a quarrel. Let's talk to him.
On a day off, Duke is looking at a passing couple with jealous eyes.
Duke is asking you about the one thing you want the most in the universe. What do you tell him?
There's been a mistake. The team's uniform is mixed up with the festival costumes. What should you tell the team?
Duke seems to be lost after having a good match while his fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to him.
With a serious face, Duke is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give him an answer.
Duke came to you after the match, and says he's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
Duke is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give him an answer.
The team is having a good run and Duke is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
Duke seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
Duke seems to be upset about losing a body check against his opponent.
Duke is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with him.
Duke is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
Duke plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with him.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Duke and talk about what to do.
Duke seems to be lost. He says he no longer hates the rival team.
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!

Duke is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to him.

Bartel is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.

Baltheon
Baltheon is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give him an answer.
Baltheon, who is determined to make everything in his life, even his dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
Baltheon announces that he will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give him an answer.
Baltheon is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to him?
Baltheon wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. He wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to him.
It seems that Baltheon is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
You find Baltheon lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
Baltheon says he doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. He thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
Baltheon wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
Baltheon caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?

Baltheon is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer him up?
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Baltheon seems to be sick of this.
Baltheon looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.

Baltheon seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.

Lindsey
Lindsey is asking about the team's goal of this season. What should you tell her?
Lindsey is asking about my ideal type of person. Should be careful about answering this...
Lindsey seems to be thinking that the team has already become the best in the universe. She seems a bit too carried away. What should you do?
Lindsey is arrogantly looking down at the other team. Let's stop her from causing any problems.
Does one have to make intentional fouls in order to win? Let's give her some advice.
Lindsey is having trouble deciding a name for her special move. Her options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.
Lindsey is all alone in the locker room worrying about the fate of the universe. Let's go talk to her.
Lindsey is making a scene. She'd rather jump into space than to be eaten alive by vicious aliens.
Lindsey is blaming the team for their pass mistakes and is questioning their soccer skills.
Lindsey is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to her?

The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.
You're sick and in bed when Fontus and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
The match and the concert that Fontus was looking for start at the same time...
Fontus wonders why Castor twitches whenever he sees Beatrice.
MX54 Butcher is closing in on a cat with a suspicious smile.
The match started and Fontus is standing still doing nothing.
Fontus seems to be lost after having a good match while his fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to him.
With a serious face, Fontus is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give him an answer.
Fontus came to you after the match, and says he's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
Fontus is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give him an answer.
The team is having a good run and Fontus is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
Fontus seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
Fontus seems to be upset about losing a body check against his opponent.
Fontus is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with him.
Fontus is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
Fontus plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with him.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Fontus and talk about what to do.
Fontus seems to be lost. He says he no longer hates the rival team.
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
Fontus's form has been improving rapidly. He says he can't wait for the next match. What should we say to him?
During a match, Fontus bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. He seems depressed. What should we say to cheer him up?
Fontus is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to him.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
Fontus is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Fontus is starting to get intimidated.
Lab Rat Rabian
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Lab Rat Rabian asks how you feel. How should we answer?
Lab Rat Rabian suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
Lab Rat Rabian is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
Lab Rat Rabian has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
As Lab Rat Rabian said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
The crowd is cheering for Lab Rat Rabian. Lab Rat Rabian seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
Lab Rat Rabian is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
Lab Rat Rabian was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
The team will not have a match for some time. Lab Rat Rabian asks you about your plan.
It's a very intense match and Lab Rat Rabian falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Lab Rat Rabian up and the two exchange smiles.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Lab Rat Rabian having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
Lab Rat Rabian is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
Lab Rat Rabian scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Lab Rat Rabian.
Lab Rat Rabian falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
Lab Rat Rabian lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Lab Rat Rabian. Let's talk to her.
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Lab Rat Rabian is curious and wants to take a look.
Lab Rat Rabian brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
Lab Rat Rabian is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give her an answer.
Lab Rat Rabian, who is determined to make everything in her life, even her dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
Lab Rat Rabian announces that she will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give her an answer.
Lab Rat Rabian is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to her?

It seems that Lab Rat Rabian is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
You find Lab Rat Rabian lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?

Lab Rat Rabian wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
