The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Lab Rat Rabian some orders.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.

Lab Rat Rabian came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.

Lab Rat Rabian is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer her up?

Alkyde
Still looking pretty heated up by the match, Alkyde is asking how she did in the match.
Alkyde looks excited as she's talking with the team about pets. She turns around and asks you what kind of pet you like.
You come across Alkyde thinking about the value of soccer. What should we tell her?
Alkyde is having trouble focusing on the match because of the affectionate emotion she feels. She says she must leave now to propose to her lover. What should we say?
Alkyde blushes up and tells you that she's happy she can play soccer with you. What should we tell her?
Alkyde is asking for special training sessions because she's not satisfied with today's performance. What should we tell her?

Alkyde feels her heart races when she sees Littre.

Alkyde is being annoying with her offensive words. What should we do?

Kalkrish
Kalkrish is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
After a meeting, Kalkrish's eyes met yours a several times and Kalkrish asks if he has something on his face.
With a serious look on his face, Kalkrish warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.
Preparing for the press conference, you're talking with Kalkrish on which player you think has the brightest future. What will you say?
Kalkrish is worried that he has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell him?
Kalkrish is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to him.
Kalkrish is asking if you have a special person who you would like to share happy moments with. Let's give him an answer.
You find Kalkrish being very excited after performing an awesome play. How will you react?
Kalkrish is having trouble focusing on the match. Let's help him out.
Kalkrish is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.
Kalkrish doesn't like the new team advertisement video.
It's Kalkrish's birthday. Let's give him a present.
You see Kalkrish's opponent trash talking and smirking towards Kalkrish. What should we do?
The team is going to go shop. Which group will you join?

Kalkrish comes to you and says that he has to leave the team because of personal reasons. What should we say?
Kalkrish is getting slow on the field and this is causing trouble. Let's talk with Kalkrish.
Kalkrish is telling a story about how an old kingdom in Valhalla was doomed because of the king.
You got a couple of tickets to Veronica's live concert. Kalkrish seems to be interested.
Kalkrish says he wants to cry because the goal keeper on the other team just won't go down no matter how many shots he makes.
You find Kalkrish depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer him up.
Kalkrish is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.

Kalkrish is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give him an answer.
Kalkrish is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to him.
Kalkrish is stressed out saying his opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
Kalkrish seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to him.
You come across Kalkrish who is limping. He says it's nothing. What should we do?
You visit Merlin's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
You're watching the storm with Kalkrish and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
Kalkrish looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
Kalkrish's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Kalkrish seems to be nervous. Let's talk to him.

Niarose's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Niarose seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Niarose.
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Niarose and her opponent isn't over yet.
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Niarose do?
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Niarose. What should you say?
Niarose is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
Latios is chatting with Niarose after the match. Let's barge in.
Niarose seems to be lost after having a good match while her fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to her.
With a serious face, Niarose is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give her an answer.
Niarose came to you after the match, and says she's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
Niarose is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give her an answer.
The team is having a good run and Niarose is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
Niarose seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
Niarose seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
Niarose is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
Niarose is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
Niarose plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Niarose and talk about what to do.
Niarose seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
Niarose's form has been improving rapidly. She says she can't wait for the next match. What should we say to her?
During a match, Niarose bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. She seems depressed. What should we say to cheer her up?
Niarose is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to her.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
Niarose is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Niarose is starting to get intimidated.

A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
Vitos wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
Vitos caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Vitos some orders.
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Vitos seems to be worried.
Vitos came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
Vitos is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer him up?
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Vitos seems to be sick of this.
Vitos looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Vitos to set some simple rules.
Vitos seems to be lost after having a good match while his fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to him.
With a serious face, Vitos is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give him an answer.
Vitos came to you after the match, and says he's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
Vitos is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give him an answer.
The team is having a good run and Vitos is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
Vitos seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
Vitos seems to be upset about losing a body check against his opponent.
Vitos is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with him.
Vitos is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
Vitos plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with him.
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Vitos and talk about what to do.
Vitos seems to be lost. He says he no longer hates the rival team.
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
Vitos's form has been improving rapidly. He says he can't wait for the next match. What should we say to him?
During a match, Vitos bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. He seems depressed. What should we say to cheer him up?
Vitos is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to him.
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
Vitos is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Vitos is starting to get intimidated.
Constance
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Constance asks how you feel. How should we answer?
Constance suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
Constance is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
Constance has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
As Constance said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
The crowd is cheering for Constance. Constance seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
Constance is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
Constance was watching penguins play soccer and suddenly decided to raise a pet penguin herself. Let's talk to her.
The team will not have a match for some time. Constance asks you about your plan.
It's a very intense match and Constance falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Constance up and the two exchange smiles.
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Constance having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
Constance is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
Constance scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Constance.
Constance falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
Constance lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Constance. Let's talk to her.
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Constance is curious and wants to take a look.
Constance brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.

This was the worst game in your entire life...Constance comes to you to cheer you up.
You're talking to Constance about what you would do if the world ends tomorrow. Let's tell her your answer.
Constance is worried about all of the powerful beings that will be competing in the Galaxy League. Let's say something to her.
Constance is training hard to become scouted like the players that moved to teams that offered better conditions. Let's give her some advice.
Constance isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. She feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Constance for solutions.
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
You were taking a walk in the Nadir forest with Constance and came across Enthia standing in the middle of a burnt part of the forest.
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
According to Constance's words, Tyler went to school 1 year earlier than William.
Constance thinks she knows who Lynbell's brother is. What should we do?
Constance won a trip around the world from a radio event!
Constance suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
The opponent team barges into the field and mocks your team saying your team is better off playing foot volleyball.
You're sick and in bed when Constance and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
The match and the concert that Constance was looking for start at the same time...
